title: Can You See Your AirDrop History? And How to See Files Shared with You

steps.title: No, you can’t see your AirDrop history.
steps.content: No, you can’t see your AirDrop history. There is not currently a way to view a history of items that you’ve sent or received over AirDrop. You can, however, easily change your AirDrop name .

steps.title: Tap Accept.
steps.content: Tap Accept . The option to Accept or Decline an item shared with you through AirDrop will appear in a popup window on your iPhone or iPad screen. You’ll need to enable AirDrop on your iPhone or iPad before you can accept items. [1] X Research source Check out our guide on backing up iPhone photos after you receive images through AirDrop.

steps.title: Go to the related app for the AirDrop item.
steps.content: Go to the related app for the AirDrop item. When you accept and receive an AirDrop, the shared item will go to the default app. Here are a few examples: [2] X Research source Photos will appear in the Photos app. You can transfer these photos to your Mac if needed! Shared web links will open in the Safari app. Links to apps will open the App Store page for that app.

steps.title: Click Accept.
steps.content: Click Accept . The option to Accept or Decline an item shared with you through AirDrop will appear in a notification in the top right of your Mac’s screen. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Open Finder.
steps.content: Open Finder. This is a blue and gray icon with a smiling face. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click Downloads in the left sidebar.
steps.content: Click Downloads in the left sidebar. This will open your Downloads folder, where you can view files you’ve received through AirDrop. [5] X Research source
